title: MISSING LOOT HELP PLEASE
body: Hello, i paused a couple of days didnt played LoL and just played some custom games with my firends, and then BOOM! absolutely zero loot zero blue/orange essence no boxes no key no Vandal Brand skin. everything gone. What to do?

replies.body:
Rest easy, I took a look at your account and everything is still there!  Are you on the updated client?  Is it showing up as clear boxes?  This may a syncing issue while on the updated client, so switch back to the legacy version and back to get that fixed up.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that works for you!
It was just a bug guys restarted LOL (New launcher) and it got back to normal
